name: Monosc-RPG
description:
Monosc-RPG is an   RPG fan game based off of small content creator Monoscore.  You play as  Monoscore himself and go on fun adventure with his friends (the only storyline completed being sheeb's  as of writing this)  and do some crazy shit like kill  markiplier,  gamble away all of you life saving and much more!

Check out the people featured in the game!
